FuncDef:
The reset ccm-send statistics command resets statistics about sent CCMs.
The reset ccm-recv statistics command resets statistics about received CCMs.
CLIs: reset ccm-send statistics md <md-name> ma <ma-name> mep <mep-id>
reset ccm-recv statistics md <md-name> ma <ma-name> mep <mep-id> remote-mep <rmep-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a maintenance association.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the ID of a MEP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191.

Specifies the name of a maintenance domain.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the ID of a remote MEP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ccm-send statistics md md1 ma ma1 mep 1
<HUAWEI> reset ccm-recv statistics md md1 ma ma1 mep 1 remote-mep 2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To reset statistics about sent CCMs, run the reset ccm-send statistics command.
To reset statistics about received CCMs, run the reset ccm-recv statistics command.
